memberdef.definition: typedef UA_StatusCode(* UA_NodeIteratorCallback)(UA_NodeId childId, UA_Boolean isInverse, UA_NodeId referenceTypeId, void *handle)
memberdef.argsstring: )(UA_NodeId childId, UA_Boolean isInverse, UA_NodeId referenceTypeId, void *handle)
memberdef.name: UA_NodeIteratorCallback

detaileddescription.para: Sets the logger used by the server
Runs the main loop of the server. In each iteration, this calls into the networklayers to see if jobs have arrived and checks if repeated jobs need to be triggered.

parameterdescription.para: The number of worker threads. Is ignored if MULTITHREADING is not activated.
Points to a boolean value on the heap. When running is set to false, the worker threads and the main loop close and the server is shut down.

simplesect.para: Indicates whether the server shut down cleanly

detaileddescription.para: The prologue part of UA_Server_run (no need to use if you call UA_Server_run)
The epilogue part of UA_Server_run (no need to use if you call UA_Server_run)
One iteration of UA_Server_run (no need to use if you call UA_Server_run)

parameterdescription.para: The job that shall be added.
The job shall be repeatedly executed with the given interval (in ms). The interval must be larger than 5ms. The first execution occurs at now() + interval at the latest.
Set to the guid of the repeated job. This can be used to cancel the job later on. If the pointer is null, the guid is not set.

simplesect.para: Upon success, UA_STATUSCODE_GOOD is returned. An error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Remove repeated job. The entry will be removed asynchronously during the next iteration of the server main loop.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the job that shall be removed.

simplesect.para: Upon sucess, UA_STATUSCODE_GOOD is returned. An error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Adds a network layer to the server. The network layer is destroyed together with the server. Do not use it after adding it as it might be moved around on the heap.

briefdescription.para: Add a new namespace to the server. Returns the index of the new namespace.
